location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Sarhang Hájji Ibrahim Khán, Commandant of the Bakhtiari Horse.’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 127 x 84 mm, on page 237 x 150 mm.Materials: Photographic print on paper.

mods.abstract: One photographic print: a full-length portrait of Sarhang (a rank equivalent to Colonel) Hajji Ibrahim Khán, Commandant of the Bakhtiari Horse. The title is printed above the photograph in Persian, and below the photograph in English. The Persian title also bears a date: Hijri year 1301 (c.1883).
